StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [ManualGetOcsClassExportData_RR07162013]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @Class varchar(8) = NULL ,@FY int = NULL ,@ClassNumber int = NULL ,@Class2 varchar(8) = NULL ,@FY2 int = NULL ,@ClassNumber2 int = NULL ) AS
DECLARE @USNAGradDate DATETIME DECLARE @ROW_COUNT INT
SELECT TOP 1 @USNAGradDate = OC.PROJECTED_COMMISSION_DATE FROM vwCurrentNWA N INNER JOIN OFFICER_CONTRACT OC ON OC.NWA_ID = N.NWA_ID WHERE YEAR(OC.PROJECTED_COMMISSION_DATE) = YEAR(GETDATE()) AND N.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE = 'N8'
Select @USNAGradDate
TRUNCATE TABLE OCS_EXPORT_TEMP
INSERT INTO OCS_EXPORT_TEMP EXEC [USMC].[GetOCScombinedUSNAExportData] @Class, @FY, @ClassNumber, @Class2, @FY2, @ClassNumber2, @USNAGradDate
